src_original: na cakṣurdhāturyāvanna manodhāturna dharmadhāturna manovijñānadhātuḥ /  na vidyā nāvidyā na kṣayo yāvanna jarāmaraṇaṃ na jarāmaraṇakṣayaḥ,
